Articles.Content: Could we just wait here for our deaths at the hands of chobit?

I fail horribly at rendezvous. I always meet up with my craft on the dark side of the planet and I'm forced to dock in darkness.

Don't even get me started...That is the very reason I ALWAYS put lights on my Spacecraft.*dives back into the mist*

Could we just wait here for our deaths at the hands of chobit?

NO! Keep talking about fail!

I SUCK at landings. I never know when to burn.
Also space planes. All my SSTOs become SSTOh no's
Any attempt to do something other than get into kerbin orbit or land on the Mun ends in disaster for me.
I always am too paranoid about how far i am from the surface. This results in me using up all my fuel trying to land. If it's at night then i will 100% crash and burn.

Any attempt to do something other than get into kerbin orbit or land on the Mun ends in disaster for me.

Even Minmus?
Yes, I can't get to the right inclination without something happening
Especially Minmus, it's the inner system breeding grounds for the Space Krakenses
what ever i try goes mostly perfect (but then again i use mech jeb) with out it i can take of and land on mun and possibly minmus havent triesd

Especially Minmus, it's the inner system breeding grounds for the Space Krakenses

Strangely enough, I have never seen the kraken. My main problem is myself and abilities.

Yes, I can't get to the right inclination without something happening

You could say that you are...*sunglasses*...Inclined to fail.

YEAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!
*one hand clapping* huzzah.
Fun fact: I sent a probe to Duna before I sent one to Minimus on my main save.

So is this like, a single Off-Topic thread?

Or... what?

OK, Nutt, can you tell us how to stay on track now?

Also, the staging of my launch clamps right now... poop.

So is this like, a single Off-Topic thread?

Or... what?

This is the House of madness 2: electric boogaloo.

So is this like, a single Off-Topic thread?

Or... what?

Its a thread of madness so no one knows quite what it is but this is meant to replace the old thread of madness.

So is this like, a single Off-Topic thread?

Or... what?

I have no idea. Whatever it is, it's probably gonna get locked soon.

(Not that I want it to)
Odin is watching over us as we speak...

Now I'm more confused than before.

GG guys.

GG.

odin is watching over us as we speak...

oh lord odin! Why hath thou forsaken us!? The madness must flow!
We must offer unto him a sacrifice to appease him!

We must offer unto him a sacrifice to appease him!

offer him our cheese cake

We must offer unto him a sacrifice to appease him!

Must we Offer thy holy lord a virgin dressed in white? Where must thou start to appease our lord?
